name: Imperium Cerebri
description:
A unique shm'up genre game with nice challenges and experience of loneliness and social life.

Game has basic shooter game controls

W - Forward

S - Backward

A - Left

D - Right

Mouse to AIM and SHOOT

Game is inside factory which is puzzle based game with alot of interactibles and enemies.

Game created by : Adarsh Kumar, Boglárka Kiss, Adelia Zemdikhanova, Alejandro Batalla, Liv Coro, Liya
